title: Beat Asteroids Game Using a Neural Network - JavaScript Tutorial
excerpt: This complete JavaScript tutorial shows how to automate an asteroids game using a neural network.  This tutorial keeps the complex theory to a minimum and demonstrates how to use a neural network in a real-world situation.
